message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY

The paper discusses opinion mining in Arabic language, specifically in Algerian news papers. This falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (CL), which is covered by cs.CL. The paper also mentions the need for powerful means to exploit the data collected from web sites, which suggests the use of information retrieval (IR) techniques, covered by cs.IR. The paper also discusses the increasing need for tracking people's mood against several subjects, which can be addressed using machine learning (ML) and data mining (DM) techniques, covered by cs.LG and cs.AI respectively. Finally, the paper mentions the development of a corpus for opinion mining, which can be considered as a contribution to the field of cybernetics (CY), covered by cs.CY.
